text: Bayn Johnson (born in November 4, 1958) is an American former actress, electric guitarist, and singer. She was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. She appeared on season 1 (1969-1970) of Sesame Street. She also appeared as "Kelly (The Short Circus kid band member)" on seasons 3-4 (1973-1975) of The Electric Company. == Other websites == * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Orleans Category:American dancers Category:American guitarists Category:Singers from New Orleans Category:Musicians from New Orleans
title: Bayn Johnson
